statements: SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT project_id, date, hours_worked FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 456 AND date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM work_hours WHERE project_id = 789 AND date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM work_hours ORDER BY date DESC, hours_worked ASC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM work_hours GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_hours > 50;
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC, hours_worked ASC;
SELECT employee_id, project_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM work_hours GROUP BY employee_id, project_id;
SELECT employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, TIMEDIFF(end_time, start_time) AS duration FROM work_hours WHERE project_id = 200;
SELECT AVG(hours_worked) AS average_hours_worked FROM work_hours WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering') AND project_id = 300 ORDER BY date;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_id FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_progress FROM projects WHERE project_progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT employee_name, project_name FROM employees INNER JOIN projects ON employees.employee_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_progress > 0.5 ORDER BY project_progress DESC;
SELECT employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, project_name FROM employees LEFT JOIN projects ON employees.employee_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, project_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM work_hours GROUP BY employee_id, project_id;

SELECT name AS employee_name, project_name, date, hours_worked FROM employees INNER JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id INNER JOIN projects ON work_hours.project_id = projects.project_id ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.name, p.project_name, w.date, w.hours_worked FROM employees e JOIN work_hours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id JOIN projects p ON w.project_id = p.project_id WHERE w.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT e.name, SUM(w.hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM employees e JOIN work_hours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING total_hours > 100;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, percentage_complete FROM Project p JOIN Progress pr ON p.project_id = pr.project_id;
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM Timesheet WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND hours_worked > 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE hourly_rate > 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employee JOIN Timesheet ON Employee.employee_id = Timesheet.employee_id WHERE hours_worked > 8
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project JOIN Progress ON Project.project_id = Progress.project_id WHERE percentage_complete < 50
SELECT * FROM Timesheet WHERE date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY hours_worked DESC
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, email, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT employee_id, project_id, start_time, end_time FROM time_tracking ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM work_hours GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_hours_worked > 100;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, p.project_name, tt.start_time, tt.end_time FROM employees e JOIN time_tracking tt ON e.id = tt.employee_id JOIN projects p ON p.id = tt.project_id ORDER BY tt.start_time ASC;
